title: Ticket #4454: condor_chirp remove_job_attr (delete/remove/clear attributes)
description: A chirp command to delete an attribute in the job ad would be handy in some instances. On startup, all attributes used in real-time could be deleted, ensuring obsolete data isn't used. I wanted this functionality when setting up a parallel universe job that established a server on node 0 and needed to advertise the location to other nodes.
creator: adesmet
